message: I'm very fluent in CodeIgniter. I've been working with it for 2 years now and I've been working with PHP for around 6.
I'm looking for someone who lives in the Bay Area. You are in TX right?
I used to know CodeIgniter like the back of my hand but have since switched to Kohana.

I have just created a group "Start Up - Meet a Co Founder" for those looking to post positions in start ups they are part of or for members who wish to be part of a start up and have expertise to offer.
